name: 詹姆斯·库克
bio_short: 英国探险家、航海家和制图师。他指挥了三次意义非凡的太平洋探险（`cook_voyages_1770s`），首次绘制了新西兰和澳大利亚东海岸的地图，并首次在实践中解决了“经度问题”。
bio_short_en: A British explorer, navigator, and cartographer. He commanded three monumental voyages to the Pacific (`cook_voyages_1770s`), creating the first charts of New Zealand and Australia's east coast and being the first to solve the 'longitude problem' in practice.
